alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Iron; Kane; Piute; Sevier (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 10:03AM MDT until May 05 at 12:15AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City UT has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Utah... Sevier River Near Hatch affecting Iron, Sevier, Garfield, Kane and Piute Counties. For the Sevier River...including Hatch...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sevier River Near Hatch. * WHEN...From this morning to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 3.9 feet, minor flooding will affect fields. Assorted bridges and select low lying structures will receive minor flood damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM MDT Monday the stage was 3.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 4.0 feet late tonight. - Flood stage is 3.9 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.0 feet on 05/17/1993. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Tuesday morning at 1000 AM MDT.
